name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Airbnb Price Corrector: True Per Night Costs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin for Airbnb that shows the real price per night in Airbnb listing, factoring the cleaning fee, Airbnb fee and any other fees.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of planning a stay on Airbnb only to discover it costs more than you expected?

Say goodbye to Airbnb’s misleading prices and hello to Airbnb Price Corrector!

 Our extension reveals the real price per night of your stay, accounting for service fees, cleaning charges, and any other hidden fees, making it easy to budget with confidence. But that's not all – we've also simplified trip planning by showing you the price per adult per night, making it easier to budget when you sharing the stay with other friends or families. With our extension, your Airbnb experience is all about transparency, affordability, and hassle-free trip planning!

Last update now have full support to all Airbnb websites in all languages!
